location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 14/2 II Arrival and departure of steamers, planes, launches etc; lists of passengers'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are notes at the end of the file, on folios 392-396. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 397; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is also present in parallel between ff 2-25; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence.

mods.abstract: The file contains documents sent by the Passport Officer of the Passport Department at Bahrain to the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, and in copy to the Political Agent at Bahrain. These include lists of passengers landed at Bahrain by sea and air, and some details on arrival and departure of steamers and planes.

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
